scripts.build: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version echo "building $npm_package_name..." && rm -rf dist && echo "node --version" && node --version && echo "npx tsc --version" && npx tsc --version && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json && npx tsc-alias -p ./tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:spec: NODE_ENV=test APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version echo "building $npm_package_name..." && rm -rf dist && echo "node --version" && node --version && echo "npx tsc --version" && npx tsc --version && npx tsc --pretty -p ./tsconfig.build-spec.json && npx tsc-alias -p ./tsconfig.build-spec.json && cp -r ./recordings ./dist/recordings && [ -e .env.test ] && cp .env.test ./dist/
scripts.dev: APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version NODE_ENV=development WORKER_COUNT=0 WORKER_COUNT=0 nodemon --quiet --no-stdin
scripts.uspec: yarn psy db:integrity-check && APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version vitest --config ./spec/unit/vite.config.ts
scripts.fspec: yarn psy db:integrity-check && APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version vitest --config ./spec/features/vite.config.ts
scripts.fspec:visible: yarn psy db:integrity-check && HEADLESS=0 vitest run --config=./spec/features/vite.config.ts
scripts.console: yarn psy db:integrity-check && APP_NAME=$npm_package_name APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version tsx ./src/conf/repl.ts
